content: Begin Layer 2 (Orchestration) implementation - ToolRegistry and ToolExecutor classes. Follow roadmap (BOOTSTRAP-COMPLETE.md Weeks 3-4). Implement auto-discovery via file system scan of examples/ directory, tool caching with hot-reload support (PM-004), category-based organization. Create ToolExecutor to coordinate parameter validation + template rendering. Target >90% test coverage. All quality gates must pass before completion.

integration_requirements: ToolRegistry discovers tools in examples/ directory
ToolRegistry caches loaded tools for performance
ToolRegistry supports hot-reload when tools change
Integration tests with all 9 example tools
